llvm::StringTableBuilder Class Reference

Utility for building string tables with deduplicated suffixes. More...

#include <StringTableBuilder.h>

Public Types

enum  Kind { ELF, WinCOFF, MachO }
 

Public Member Functions

StringRef add (StringRef s)
 Add a string to the builder. Returns a StringRef to the internal copy of s. Can only be used before the table is finalized. More...
 
void finalize (Kind kind)
 Analyze the strings and build the final table. No more strings can be added after this point. More...
 
StringRef data ()
 Retrieve the string table data. Can only be used after the table is finalized. More...
 
size_t getOffset (StringRef s)
 Get the offest of a string in the string table. Can only be used after the table is finalized. More...
 
void clear ()
 

Detailed Description

Utility for building string tables with deduplicated suffixes.
